original_text: And the glory of the Lord went up from the midst of the city, and stood upon the mountain which is on the east side of the city.
korean_text: 여호와의 영광이 성읍 가운데에서부터 올라가 성읍 동쪽 산에 머무르고

sentences.original_text: And the glory of the Lord went up
from the midst of the city
which is on the east side of the city
